      • LoginSubscriber

        private boolean LoginSubscriber(java.lang.String subscriberID,
                                java.lang.String ErrorMessageForPopUp,
                                boolean needPopUpForFail)
        try to log in as a Subscriber
        Parameters:
        subscriberID - the ID to use
        ErrorMessageForPopUp - the message to show in case of an error
        needPopUpForFail - indicator if an error pop up is needed
        Returns:
        true if logged in successfully
        false otherwise
